hero.title: Apply for Your UK ETA
hero.subtitle: Electronic Travel Authorization
hero.description: Fast, secure, and hassle-free UK ETA application service. Get your authorization in just 72 hours.

notice.title: Important Notice:
notice.text: This is an independent third-party service and is not affiliated with the UK Government or UKVI.

trust.notice: This service is provided by an independent third party and is not affiliated with the UK Government.

steps.title: Simple 4-Step Process
steps.subtitle: Complete your UK ETA application in minutes with our guided process.

step1.title: Complete Application
step1.description: Fill out the secure online form with your personal and travel details.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Securely upload your passport and photo to our encrypted platform.

step3.title: Make Payment
step3.description: Secure payment processing with multiple payment options available.

step4.title: Receive ETA
step4.description: Get your approved ETA delivered directly to your email inbox.

applicationSteps.title: Simple 4-Step Process
applicationSteps.subtitle: Our streamlined application process makes getting your UK ETA fast and easy

step1.title: Complete Application
step1.description: Fill out the secure online form with your personal and travel details.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Submit your passport copy and photo. Our system validates all requirements automatically.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Pay securely with credit card, debit card, or PayPal. All transactions are encrypted.

step4.title: Receive Authorization
step4.description: Get your UK ETA via email within 72 hours. Track your application status online.

footer.disclaimer: This website is operated by an independent third-party and is not affiliated with the UK Government or UK Visas and Immigration (UKVI).

brand.title: UK ETA Application
brand.subtitle: Third-party service provider
brand.description: Professional UK ETA application assistance with expert support and secure processing.

application.title: UK ETA Application Form
application.subtitle: Please fill out all required fields accurately

documents.title: Upload Documents
documents.subtitle: Please upload your passport and photo

requirements.title: Requirements:
requirements.readable: Clear, readable image of passport personal details page
requirements.visible: All text must be visible and legible

requirements.title: Photo Requirements:
requirements.noObjects: No people or objects in background
requirements.visibility: Full head, shoulders, and upper body visible
requirements.lighting: Even lighting with no shadows or glare

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Complete your payment to submit your application

details.title: Payment Details
details.security: Your payment is secured with SSL encryption and processed through trusted payment providers.

tracking.title: Track Your Application
tracking.subtitle: Enter your reference number to check your application status

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you have any questions about your application, please contact our support team.
